content: axolotl info materials white and pastel rainbow yarn stuffing approx 3 5mm hook depending on your yarn 1 body row 1 6sc magic_ring 6 row 2 6inc 12 row 3 1sc increase x6 18 row 4 to 7 18sc 18 row 8 1sc decrease 1sc ch4 turn 3slst x3 1sc decrease 1sc decrease 1sc ch4 turn 3slst x3 1sc decrease 14 row 9 2sc 4scblo 1sc increase 1sc 4scblo 1sc goes through the blo for stitches with chains in the way 15 row 10 3sc decrease x3 put in safety eyes 12 row 11 1sc increase x6 add some stuffing to the head 18 row 12 4sc increase single_crochet increase 6sc increase single_crochet increase 2sc 22 row 13 to 14 22sc 22 row 15 4sc decrease single_crochet decrease 6sc decrease single_crochet decrease 2sc 18 row 16 to 23 18sc 18 row 24 4sc increase single_crochet increase 6sc increase single_crochet increase 2sc 22 row 25 to 26 22sc 22 row 27 4sc decrease single_crochet decrease 6sc decrease single_crochet decrease 2sc 22 row 28 18sc 18 row 29 7sc decrease x2 16 row 30 16sc 16 row 31 6sc decrease x2 14 row 32 14sc 14 row 33 5sc decrease x2 12 row 34 12sc 12 row 35 4sc decrease x2 10 row 36 10sc 10 row 37 3sc decrease x2 8 row 38 8sc 8 row 39 2sc decrease x2 6 row 40 6sc 6 row 41 1sc decrease x2 4 secure yarn end 1 legs row 1 8sc magic_ring 8 row 1 8scblo 8 row 3 to 5 8sc 8 row 6 2sc decrease x2 6 slip_stitch to finish and whip stitch closed then sew to the body 1 gills attach yarn at the base of each gill using a slip_stitch then single_crochet around each of the small white gills 3 single_crochet up the first side 3 single_crochet in the end stitch and 3 more single_crochet down the other side secure the end of the yarn after each gill 1 tail starting at approx 25-26th row of the body slip_stitch 2sc 2hdc 4dc 6tc tcinc tcinc tcinc this one should be in the very tip of the tail tcinc tcinc 6tc 4dc 2hdc 2sc slip_stitch finished
